verbose_text: Cells transduced with dCas9-D3A together with sgRNAs showed an increase in Cdkn1a promoter DNA methylation by over 25% across the entire target region (and by as much as 40-85% at individual CpGs around sgRNAs) compared to all control groups (XREF_FIG B, C), and a reduction in Cdkn1a expression by approximately 40% (XREF_FIG D).
